thread.title: Prajwal and Ragini to honeymoon in Europe
thread.title_full: Prajwal and Ragini to honeymoon in Europe - The Times of India

author: Sunayana Suresh
title: Prajwal and Ragini to honeymoon in Europe
text:
It's celebration time for the Kannada film industry, as Sandalwood's Dynamic Prince Prajwal Devaraj ties the knot with his long-time girlfriend and model-danseuse Ragini Chandran this week. Party time for Prajwal and his gang began a while ago with a bachelors' trip in South East Asia. We spoke to his father, actor Devaraj, who said that the family's been busy with the preparations.
"The wedding is on October 25. We have all been busy with the preparations. It has been an exciting time for the family," he says about the wedding, which will be held at Palace Grounds. He also reveals that Prajwal will take three weeks off from his busy schedule after the wedding. "Prajwal and Ragini should be heading to Europe," he adds.
